question:
Which of the following passes are located in Jammu & Kashmir?
1. Aghil Pass
2. Banihal Pass
3. Khardung La Pass
4. Pensi La Pass
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: All of the four passes are located in Jammu & Kashmir. Aghil Pass- Ladakh with China. Banihal Pass- Jammu with Srinagar. Khardung La Pass- Leh with Siachen. Pensi La Pass- Kashmir with Kargil.
